name: Samurai Game Beta Test
description:
How to Play: 

Q - High Block (Blocks attack going from up to down)

E - Mid Block (Blocks Attack going from left to right)

Left Click - High Attack (Attack going from Up to Down)

Right Click - Mid Attack (Attack going from left to right)

Movement - A and D to move

Tips: You can get stunned the same way you stun enemies. Be patient.
